api.APIResponse.description: Standard API response envelope used by all endpoints

success.description: Indicates if the request was successful

api.BulkDatabaseQueryRequest.description: Request payload for executing multiple database queries in a single operation

api.BulkDatabaseQueryResponse.description: Response containing results from multiple database queries with metadata

api.BulkDatabaseStatsRequest.description: Request payload for retrieving database statistics for multiple schemas/databases

api.BulkDatabaseStatsResponse.description: Response containing database statistics with metadata

api.BulkEnrichedDataRequest.description: Request payload for retrieving enriched data for multiple campaigns

api.BulkQueryMetadata.description: Metadata containing processing statistics and performance metrics for bulk database operations

api.BulkStatsMetadata.description: Metadata containing processing statistics for bulk database statistics operations

configDetails.description: Accept structured config as JSON - can be HttpPersonaConfig or DnsPersonaConfig

api.DatabaseQuery.description: Individual query with identifier for bulk operations

api.DatabaseQueryResult.description: Response containing query results with metadata

path.description: API path that generated the error

api.Metadata.description: Optional metadata attached to API responses

configDetails.description: Return structured config as JSON - can be HttpPersonaConfig or DnsPersonaConfig

api.PhaseConfigureRequest.description: Request payload for configuring campaign phase parameters

api.SchemaStats.description: Statistics for a specific database schema

api.TableStats.description: Statistics for a specific database table

configDetails.description: Accept structured config as JSON - can be HttpPersonaConfig or DnsPersonaConfig

field.description: Field that caused the error (for validation)

github_com_fntelecomllc_studio_backend_i.description: Proxy server connection and authentication details

inputPassword.description: For API input, to be hashed into PasswordHash

inputUsername.description: Fields for input/logic, not direct DB columns if already covered by Address or PasswordHash

username.description: Username for proxy auth, from DB

domainConfig.description: Domain generation config for Phase 1 initialization
